>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.16dMPIIWiQasj8Z7]{Starsinger}

Select one melee weapon or small arm with which you’re proficient to become your sacred weapon. This weapon is imbued with magic, granting you the ability to cast a 1st- or 2nd-level spell of your choice as a spell-like ability once per day while you wield it. At 12th level, you gain the ability to cast a 3rd- or 4th-level spell of your choice as a spell-like ability once per day while you wield your sacred weapon. Once selected, the spell can’t be changed. The save DC of the spell is equal to 10 + the spell’s level + your key ability score modifier, and your caster level is equal to your character level. In addition, you’re always proficient with starknives and gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.bMZTC3m95OSPFlTG]{Weapon Focus} (Starknife) as a bonus feat.
